question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. coffee machine
B. fridge
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The fridge is positioned on the far right side of the image, near a doorway, while the coffee machine is on the left side of the counter closer to the foreground, making the fridge clearly further away in 3D space.
